text: Clean Ponds () is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksey Sakharov.ЧИСТЫЕ ПРУДЫ (1965) It stars Aleksandr Zbruyev, Tamara Syomina, and Svetlana Svetlichnaya. == Actors == * Aleksandr Zbruyev as Sergei * Tamara Syomina as Anna * Svetlana Svetlichnaya as Katya * Lyudmila Gladunko as Zhenya * Eugenia Filonova as Nina (as Yevghenia Filonova) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1965 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Clean Ponds (movie)
